name: Sales Partners Commission
query:
SELECT
	si.sales_partner AS "Sales Partner:Link/Sales Partner:150",
	sp.partner_type AS "Partner Type:Link/Sales Partner Type:150",
	si.territory AS "Territory:Link/Territory:150",
	count(si.name) AS "Total Invoices:Float:100",
	sum(si.base_net_total) AS "Invoiced Amount (Exclusive Tax):Currency:210",
	sum(si.total_commission) AS "Total Commission:Currency:150",
	sum(si.total_commission) * 100 / sum(si.base_net_total) AS "Average Commission Rate:Percent:170"
FROM
	`tabSales Invoice` si
		LEFT JOIN `tabSales Partner` sp ON sp.name = si.sales_partner
WHERE
	si.docstatus = 1
		AND ifnull(si.base_net_total, 0) > 0
		AND ifnull(si.total_commission, 0) > 0
		AND posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY
	sales_partner
ORDER BY
	sum(si.total_commission) DESC
